name: Crematoriums
text: [§342B-35]  Crematoriums.  Crematoriums of human remains operating within the State shall be subject to the permit requirements of this chapter; provided that the owners or operators of any crematoriums constructed before March 20, 1972, and operating within the State without a permit shall submit permit applications to the department no later than December 31, 2013. [L 2012, c 278, §2]
